mapper.select: select member_rank,count(member_rank) as member_rank_total from tb_member_details group by member_rank;

SELECT goods.category_goods_name, SUM(sell.goods_sell_price) as goods_sell_price, COUNT(details.order_details_goods_sell_no) as count_total FROM tb_order_details details LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_goods_sell sell ON details.order_details_goods_sell_no = sell.goods_sell_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_category_goods goods ON sell.goods_sell_goods_no = goods.category_goods_no GROUP BY goods.category_goods_name,details.order_details_goods_sell_no,sell.goods_sell_price ORDER BY count(details.order_details_goods_sell_no) DESC;
